AI.name: Cobra-AP
AI.tip: Designed with a focus on research. Uses Anti-Personnel weapons
AI.easy_tip:
Gets 25% less power from each oil derrick
Basic decision making is slower
AI.medium_tip:
Gets 10% more power from each oil derrick
Intended for fair play
AI.hard_tip: Gets 50% more power from each oil derrick
AI.insane_tip:
Gets 100% more power from each oil derrick
Starts with defensive structures and oil derricks
